import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { server } from '../global'; class Signup extends Component { state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', username: '', password: '', gender: '' }; handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.id]: e.target.value }); } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let model = { first_name: this.state.first_name, last_name: this.state.last_name, email: this.state.email, username: this.state.username, password: this.state.password, gender: '' }; axios.post(server + '/accounts/api/user/create', model) .then(data => { console.log(data); }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); } ) } render() { return (

Sign Up

); } } export default Signup;
